publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-5171 Christina McKelvie: Apprentices—That the Parliament notes the reported plans of the UK Government to implement savage cuts in funding for apprenticeships and training places; further notes the comments of Andy Kerr MSP in the chamber on 28th January 2009 that "At this time in the economic cycle, it is vital that we invest in apprenticeships", and congratulates the Scottish Government on its foresightedness in realigning the modern apprenticeship framework, increasing the number of places available and implementing the ScotAction package to protect the apprenticeship programme in difficult economic times.
S3M-5171 Apprentices (lodged on 10 November 2009) Stuart McMillan*, Rob Gibson*, Shirley-Anne Somerville*, Kenneth Gibson*, Bill Wilson*, Brian Adam*
